# Text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                         | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Default   |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | The text alignment of the component.                                | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`                                                                                                                                                                         | `"left"`  |
| `color`    | `color`    | Basic text color variations.                                        | `"black" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                    | `"black"` |
| `ellipsis` | `ellipsis` | Adds an ellipsis to a single line of text if it overflows.          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                               | `false`   |
| `inline`   | `inline`   | Sets the text as display: inline.                                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                               | `false`   |
| `tag`      | `tag`      | Set a custom HTML tag depending of the usage of the text component. | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                | `"p"`     |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Adapts the loader color when used on dark background.               | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                     | `"light"` |
| `type`     | `type`     | The style of the text.                                              | `"copy" \| "small" \| "12" \| "16" \| "20" \| "24" \| "28" \| "30" \| "32" \| "36" \| "42" \| "44" \| "48" \| "52" \| "60" \| "60-thin" \| "62" \| "62-thin" \| "72" \| "72-thin" \| "84" \| "84-thin"` | `"copy"`  |
| `wrap`     | `wrap`     | Wraps the text, even when it has to break a word.                   | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                               | `false`   |
